[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt, unrelated phrases ("A machine-learning model updated itself"; "A language translation chip rebooted") disrupt thematic flow.
[TRANSITION]: Sudden shifts between art critique and defensive apologia (e.g., transitioning from Millet’s technique to rebutting sentimentality claims).
